name: DynamiTracer
description:
Dynami Tracer (ダイナマイ・トレーサー) is a Adventure video game published by SquareSoft released on January 27th, 1996 for the SNES.
This game was done by square using the Chrono Trigger engine, but despise its looks it's not an RPG. It's an adventure game with no combat set in space.
